tasks.deploy:all: deno task predeploy && npx supabase@latest functions deploy ingest-live-frame ingest-snapshot live-current config alerts-create camera-heartbeat retention-cleanup --project-ref bxfpksbyhpjfaioubrds --use-api
tasks.deploy:snapshot: deno task predeploy && npx supabase@latest functions deploy ingest-snapshot --project-ref bxfpksbyhpjfaioubrds --use-api
tasks.serve:snapshot: deno task predeploy && npx supabase@latest functions serve ingest-snapshot --no-verify-jwt
